title: I went from Un-ranked to Gold V in 5 days...
body:
Should i keep playing ranked to increase my MMR before the reset on the 15th? Or would it be easier to stop playing ranked now and just wait for the reset? 

Oh and could someone give me the rundown on this seasons reset please?

replies.body: well... i went from silver 5 to bronze 3 in a year... Beat That!

You become unranked, most of your **preseason** MMR change is wiped (it will have a little impact but not much) and you replay your 10 placement games.

There is a reason they turn off decay and make LP a lot easier to get during preseason. Doesn't count for much.

> [{quoted}](name=BarryButcher,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=i6fnAKvJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-01-13T08:55:05.549+0000)
>
> You become unranked, most of your **preseason** MMR change is wiped (it will have a little impact but not much) and you replay your 10 placement games.
> 
> There is a reason they turn off decay and make LP a lot easier to get during preseason. Doesn't count for much.

Stop spreading filthy lies please.

PSA: If you do not know 100% if you are right, do not post, that how people start believing wrong things.
